welcome_message_body: Welcome to Richmond, Canada, a city known for its rich cultural diversity, delicious cuisine, and stunning waterfront views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Richmond has to offer during your visit!

restaurants.name: Moon Rock Cafe
restaurants.description: Moon Rock Cafe is a restaurant located in Richmond.

restaurants.name: Rivers Restaurant
restaurants.description: Rivers Restaurant is a restaurant located in Richmond.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boundary Bay Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Boundary Bay Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vancouver International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Vancouver International Airport serves regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coal Harbour Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Coal Harbour Airport is dedicated to serving regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miners Bay Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Miners Bay Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springbank Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
